1291040.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night TP120 Scifi Characters 2
1291040.description:
Devin Night TP120 Scifi Characters 2

TP120 Sci-fi Characters 2, This pack contains 38 hand-drawn and colored tokens of alien characters. Suitable for any sci-fi campaign.
This product contains:
  • Alien Armored
  • Alien Engineer
  • Alien Engineer Headless
  • Alien Infiltrator
  • Alien Infiltrator Headless
  • Alien Marine
  • Alien Marine Headless
  • 2 Alien Scientist
  • 2 Alien Scientist Headless
  • Alien Soldier
  • Alien Soldier headless
  • 20 Alien Heads
  • Female Alien Adept
  • Female Alien Adept Headless
  • Female Alien Merc
  • Female Alien Merc Headless
  • Female Alien Scientist
  • Female Alien Scientist Headless
  • Female Human Gunner
  • Female Human Gunner Headless
  • 2 Lizzard Dog
  • Male Alien Thug
  • Male Alien Thug Headless
  • Male Gunner Knight
  • Male gunner Knight Headless
  • Male Human Soldier
  • Male Human Soldier Headless
  • Male Light Infiltrator
  • Male Light Infiltrator Headless
  • Mech Heavy
  • Mech Light Gunner
  • Mechbot
  • Mercenary
  • Mercenary Headless
Converted by:  
James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
